value.string: ### Count the files in the Input folder and if Cnt=0, send email

### Set login failed times to 0, so we get a login failed notification for every n login failures
### Loop each file in the Input folder
### Move a file to the Process folder

### If there are any files in the Process folder, move them to Input folder
### Send one login failure notification for every 10 login bot failures
### Initialize the counting to 0 for login failed, since for the present case the login in successful
### Send Email attaching the output file
